title: $750 Million Lawsuit Filed Against Travis Scott, Drake and Others Over Astroworld Tragedy
sub_head: Lawsuit on behalf of 125 festivalgoers says musicians, companies failed to create safe conditions
body:
A lawsuit filed on behalf of 125 Astroworld attendees seeks $750 million in punitive damages from musicians Travis Scott and Drake, as well as corporations involved in the festival.
The lawsuit, filed Tuesday in Harris County, Texas, alleges defendants including Apple Inc. and Live Nation Entertainment Inc . failed to create safe conditions. At least 10 people died and two dozen were hospitalized after a crowd surge at the Houston event.
